level.text: When used in this chapter, the term “residential uses” shall have the same meaning as the term “residential purposes” as set forth in ยง 631.2, except as otherwise qualified. See ยง 1601.3 for example.

level.heading: SOURCE
level.text: Final Rulemaking published at 52 DCR 72 (January 7, 2005); as corrected by Errata Notice published at 58 DCR 4314, 4315 (May 20, 2011).
